Introduction

Hi there! I'm Chris Oliver and I'm a Web Developer from the sunny town of Blackpool. My primary skillset includes; HTML/CSS, Laravel, VueJS, Tailwind, MySQL, Photoshop and After Effects.

In previous employment, I've used VB.NET, PHP/Wordpress, and After Effects. Find out more about my work experience on LinkedIn. I'm always looking to connect with other freelancers & creative agancies, so feel free to contact me by LinkedIn.
